page.title: 02FAMILY LIFE SURVEY 1
page.content:
A survey was carried out amongst pupils at Longdendale Community School who live in Hollingworth, Cheshire. The survey revealed the following facts: Most families had lived in the village for over five years and most of them lived in terraced houses which were owner occupied. The average size of each family was 4-5 people.
Most families have a car which is used for travelling to work or just for pleasure.
Almost every family has a washing machine, television and record player. Video recorders and microwave ovens are quite popular too. Of those who have a video recorder the majority do not belong to a Vidoe Club.
